title: Why?
body:
hey Riot I have the summoner name Hi im XepTh in Legue Of Legends and when i try to go in Ranked its says Give the client a restart and buzz.supp
Please Help me.{{champion:238}}

replies.body:
Hey Xepth. Did a bit of research for someone who had a similar problem a few months ago. This is what Riot Eambo said

"This issue can sometimes be caused by being suspended from the game but not receiving the correct message about this - normally this involves getting this "Oof" error message, as well as being unable to connect to chat.

...I'd advise contacting http://support.leagueoflegends.com for further assistance, as well as checking your email for any notifications of suspension - this may not be the case, but previously I've seen it happen."

I'd like to help you out with this, but I'm not exactly sure where the issue is happening.  Are you crashing, and is it during your match or while it's loading?  Are you receiving any error messages?  Any additional information might help!

If you're having client issues I would suggest performing a client repair by clicking the question mark on the top right of your launcher.

If you are having account issues, please submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so they can assist you.
